title: veigar is too weak now
body: i love viegar he is 1 of my fav chars and i played a game today and i dont like it anymore his q is a great i dear and does help with laining but with his e now and .75sec before it shows up is just useless you can cast on people who stand in the middle of it and they have enough time to move out of it so i dont see how he is a 100 to 0 burst champ anymore i dont mind the change but pls make his e attack worth something again

replies.body:
I suggest watching the patch rundown, or at least finding where they talk about Veigar in it and watching that part. They discuss the concept of the changes and some other stuff.
He is different now. His difficulty has gone up a bit. 0.75 is a little bit long, but I'm not sure about it being too long. I got trapped in it a few times today. I'd like to see it some more before I make my final judgements.
make his q more rewarding, hsi ap ratio sucks now.
What a {{champion:35}} Veigar one of the most op champs in game
veigar is still fine just means he has to use stun better

he was my fav champ too and i have spent really long to practice smart cast e. but now the 0.75 second e just ruined everything i played a game today and realized how useless he is now and i will never touch him again,

idear, laining, lol, the idea behind the entire thing is to make it so he can't 100-0 the same thing they have done with almost every assassin in the game, it gives him some actual mechanical prowess rather than hitting e and free kill, veigar was a skill-less, face rolling, ridiculous champion and you should feel dumb for making this thread
